main event: An observer reported seeing a star-like light changing colors in the sky for at least 25 minutes.
interesting points: The light changed colors between red, blue, white, and green.,The object made no sound and remained stationary during the observation.,The object was observed by approximately 35 other witnesses, including students and faculty.,The observer described the light as appearing about the size of a star.,The phenomenon appeared to drop behind some trees before it was no longer visible.
witness description: students and faculty at the College of Memphis
